article:
Events and trends
* 699 BCâKhallushu succeeds Shuttir-Nakhkhunte as king of the Elamite Empire.
* 697 BCâBirth of Duke Wen of Jin in China.
* 697 BCâDeath of Zhou huan wang, the Emperor of the Zhou Dynasty of China.
* 697 BCâHezekiah succeeded by Manasseh as king of Judah.
* 696 BCâZhou zhuang wang becomes the Emperor of the Zhou Dynasty of China.
* 696 BCâThe Cimmerians ravage Phrygia, possible migration of the Armenians.
* 692 BCâKarib'il Watar of Saba' is recorded as having given "gifts" (tribute)
  to King Sennacherib of Assyria.
* 691 BCâKing Sennacherib of Assyria defeats king Humban-nimena of Elam in the
  Battle of Halule.
* 690 BCâTaharqa, a king of the Twenty-fifth Dynasty, ascends the throne of
  Egypt (approximate date)
* c. 690 BC-664 BCâSphinx of Taharqa, from Temple T, Kawa, Nubia, is made. Twenty-
  fifth dynasty of Egypt. It is now kept at The British Museum, London.
* c. 690 BCâDeath of Manava, author of the Indian geometric text of
  Sulba Sutras.
* 690s BCâW'rn Hywt of D'mt in Ethiopia appears in the inscriptional record and
  mentions the king of Saba', Karib'il Watar.
